Package it.uniroma1.mdp.juno.model

Interface PlayStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerControlled, RandomPicking
public interface PlayStrategy
Interface for player card picking behavior
Author:
Sebastiano Deodati

  • Method Details

    • hasCompatible

      static boolean hasCompatible(List<Card> cards, Card lastDropped)
      Checks if a compatible card with the last dropped is present
      Parameters:
      cards - list of cards currently held
      lastDropped - last dropped card for compatibility check
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one compatible card, false otherwise

    • hasCompatibleExceptDraw4

      static boolean hasCompatibleExceptDraw4(List<Card> cards, Card lastDropped)
      Checks if a compatible card with the last dropped is present except for draw4
      Parameters:
      cards - list of cards currently held
      lastDropped - last dropped card for compatibility check
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one compatible card, false otherwise

    • play

      Card play(List<Card> cards, Card lastDropped) throws NoCompatibleCardsException
      Selects a card to play
      Parameters:
      cards - list of cards currently held
      lastDropped - card played by previous player
      Returns:
      selected card
      Throws:
      NoCompatibleCardsException - when no compatible cards are found

    • pickColor

      Card.Color pickColor()
      Chooses a color when a jolly is played
      Returns:
      the chosen color
